aspect: Primary data source for foreign-born immigration
vintage_2009: Decennial census foreign-born counts and INS administrative records
vintage_2020: American Community Survey Residence One Year Ago (ROYA) question
vintage_2024: ACS ROYA plus DHS administrative data for humanitarian migrants

vintage_2009: Residual method - subtracting known components from census foreign-born total
vintage_2020: Direct measurement via survey question on residence abroad one year ago
vintage_2024: ROYA method with 75% adjustment for humanitarian migrants using DHS data
impact_on_comparability: High - residual vs. direct measurement creates different error structures

vintage_2009: INS data on intended residence and decennial census patterns
vintage_2020: 3-year pooled ACS 1-year files for state demographic distributions
vintage_2024: Same ACS-based distribution applied to DHS-adjusted national total
impact_on_comparability: Medium - allocation methods evolved; 2024 may not capture humanitarian patterns

vintage_2020: ACS 5-year files controlled to state totals
impact_on_comparability: Low for county level if analyzing state aggregates

vintage_2009: Residual technique using consecutive census comparisons
vintage_2020: Emigration rates by country of birth and tenure using ACS year of entry
ACS-based estimates of natives moving abroad/returning

vintage_2024: Airline Passenger Traffic (APT) data from BTS starting 2021
impact_on_comparability: Medium for states with PR migration

vintage_2009: Das Gupta method distributing error of closure across decade

vintage_2020: 2020 Census blended with Vintage 2020 estimates and 2020 DA
impact_on_comparability: Medium - blended base different from pure census base

vintage_2009: Not applicable - ACS not fully implemented until 2005
vintage_2024: 1-2 year lag plus administrative data supplement
impact_on_comparability: Low - lag is inherent to ACS method

vintage_2020: May be underrepresented in ACS sampling frame
vintage_2024: Partially addressed by DHS adjustment for humanitarian migrants

vintage_2009: Counted in decennial census if present
impact_on_comparability: High for years 2021+ relative to earlier periods

vintage_2024: No explicit uncertainty published for state level
impact_on_comparability: High - cannot compare uncertainty across methods

vintage_2009: Entire series revised with each new vintage
vintage_2020: Entire series revised with each new vintage
vintage_2024: Entire series revised with each new vintage
